revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys_WRT54G2.jpg |image1_size = 200px |caption = Wireless-G Broadband Router |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/en-us/support/lbc/WRT54G2 |dl = |fandom = Linksys_WRT54G2_v1.3 |wikidevi = Linksys_WRT54G2_v1.3 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Linksys |model = WRT54G2 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1.3 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/06/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G2_v1.3 |wlclass = G54 |series = WRT54G2 |type = wireless router |sernum = CUQ0 |fcc_id = Q87-WRT54G2V13 |icid = 3839A-WRT54G2V13 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG (BCM5354 rev 2 or rev 3 SoC); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 (R1) |cpu1spd = 240 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV160AT-70TCP;EN29LV160AT-70TCP H132348 0706TSC; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V641620FTP-7;844A C HY57V641620FTP-7; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = CFE |stockos = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/25/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = Green/Amber |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 13 |rad1cap = ap sta wet led wme 802.11d 802.11h rm cqa mbss4 afterburner acktiming }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Same hardware as [[Linksys WRT54GS2|WRT54GS2 v1.0]] ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRTL54G2_v1.3_%26_WRT54GS2_v1.0 On the DD-WRT wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=59095 On the DD-WRT forums] *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G_series Listed on the WRT54G series page on Wikipedia] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|microreq}} {{DDWRTNotice|k24req}} Supported by dd-wrt as of = Nov 05, 2009 '''***Warning***''' - There is no Revert for this router at this time
#Configure your computer's local lan ethernet address to 192.168.1.7, subnet 255.255.255.0, gateway 192.168.1.1 . Then connect an Ethernet cable to your computer and port 1 of your router. '''(Do Not Use Wireless)(Nothing else connected to router)''' #Perform a [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/Hard reset or 30/30/30|Hard reset or 30/30/30]]. #Open your browser to http://192.168.1.1. #Use the firmware upgrade dialog to flash [http://www.dd-wrt.com/dd-wrtv2/downloads/others/eko/WRT54G2V13%20Flashing/VxWorksKiller-G2V13.bin Vxworkskiller-G2V13.bin]. #WAIT for at least five minutes before you continue! (longer is better) Give vxworks killer plenty of time to do its magic! #You will not be able to browse the WRT54G2V13 at this point, but you should be able to ping 192.168.1.1. If the router doesn't reply you haven't set your computer's network settings correctly (on step 1) #Tftp the DD-WRT firmware to the router, use latest [http://www.dd-wrt.com/dd-wrtv2/downloads/others/eko/WRT54G2V13%20Flashing/dd-wrt.v24_micro_generic.bin dd-wrt.v24_micro_generic.bin] from the folder where you got these instructions; after sucessful tftp, wait 5 min for the router to finish writing new nvram deafults, etc... It should reboot on its own at least 2 times, so give it 5 min and then go to http://192.168.1.1 (If it not reboot on its own, wait another 2 min, and then power cycle it) , you should see the password reset page. Don't worry about changing it at this point. #Perform a [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/Hard reset or 30/30/30|Hard reset or 30/30/30]]. #WAIT for at least 5 minutes before you continue! (longer is better) Give the router plenty of time to to boot. #Browse 192.168.1.1, you should see the password reset page, change it! Then configure. # Check for recommended builds [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT#Recommended_Builds|here]]. ==Upgrading== {{Upgrade dd-wrt}} ==Reverting== '''***Warning***''' - There is no Revert for this router at this time ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== nTRST 1o o2 GND TDI 3o o4 GND TDO 5o o6 GND TMS 7o o8 GND TCK 9o o10 GND nSRST 11o o12 N/C '''Using [[TechInfoDepot:JTAG/TIAO - Universal JTAG User Manual (Parallel)|Universal JTAG Adapter]]''' white 1o o2 black red 3o o4 GND blue 5o o6 GND green 7o o8 GND yelow 9o o10 GND orange 11o o12 N/C */noreset switch required ====JTAG Recovery==== #Backup CFE x2 (Compare the files, they must match exactly or there is something wrong with your JTAG setup) #Erase Wholeflash x2 #Flash CFE #Unplug Power #Unplug JTAG Cable [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/TFTP flash#Linksys TFTP_GUI|TFTP]]: #Set Rig ip static 192.168.1.10 #Plug network cable from rig to port 1 #Get TFTP ready, server ip - 192.168.1.1, Password - blank, file - [ftp://dd-wrt.com/others/eko/BrainSlayer-V24-preSP2/older/12-28-09-r13525/broadcom/dd-wrt.v24_micro_generic.bin dd-wrt.v24_micro_generic.bin] #Plug in power #As soon as windows says "connected" hit upgrade. May have to use a network hub to make sure windows is always connected. #Hard Reset 30\30\30 ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== VCC 1 o TX 3 o RX 5 o N/C 7 o GND 9 o ====Serial Recovery==== {{Modified redhawk0 instructions|wrt54g2v3}} ==Pictures==
'''FCCID {{fccid|Q87-WRT54G2V13}}''' File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 001.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 002.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 003.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 004.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 005.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 006.png| File:FCCID Q87-WRT54G2V13 007.png|
